column5: Got out a couple times in the last four days to fish for Burbot, lots of small ones but they put up a decent fight and it's a non stop slimefest this time of year as they start their spawn. Only caught one that was milting, but it's about to get slimier lol. Now where'd I put that pack of beer batter? VIDEO LINKS.https://youtu.be/hct8fVnsqbohttps://youtu.be/6O_3tcuzXWc
Cool video. My favorite fish to eat.
Thanks! I don't do many videos inside the shack, but temps dipped quickly here at night and there have been some stiff northerly winds recently. I like ling, but the rest of my family not so much.
